title: HTML
info: Markup language for creating web pages and web applications.

title: CSS
info: Style sheet language for designing the presentation of web pages.

title: React
info: JavaScript library for building user interfaces, maintained by Facebook.

title: Node
info: avaScript runtime environment for executing server-side applications.

title: GraphQL
info: Query language for APIs, alternative to REST, developed by Facebook.

title: MongoDB
info: NoSQL database, stores data in JSON-like documents, widely used.

title: Figma
info: Collaborative interface design tool for creating digital prototypes and mockups.

title: Redux
info: Predictable state container for JavaScript apps, commonly used with React.

title: Redis
info: In-memory data structure store, used as a database, cache.

title: Python
info: High-level programming language known for its simplicity, versatility, and readability.

title: Git
info: Version control system for tracking changes in source code.
